member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Config.ContentPacks.FishingContentPack.Include
member.summary: The additional content files to include. These are treated the same as your mod's content.json. The paths are relative to this file's content.json (this is different than Content Patcher!).

member.name: T:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Config.FishConfig
member.summary: Configuration for fish.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Config.FishConfig.ShowFishInMinigame
member.summary: Whether to show the fish being caught in the fishing minigame.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Config.FishConfig.GlobalDartFrequencyFactor
member.summary: Modifier for the dart frequency (difficulty) of all fish.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Config.FishConfig.CatchSpeed
member.summary: Affects how fast you catch fish.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Config.FishConfig.DrainSpeed
member.summary: Affects how fast the catch bar drains when the bobber isn't on the fish.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Config.FishConfig.StreakForIncreasedQuality
member.summary: Required streak for an increase in quality. For example, 3 means that every 3 consecutive perfect catches increases your catch quality by 1. A value of 0 or less disables any quality increase from your perfect fishing streak. (You still get a quality increase for perfectly catching a fish though.)

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Config.FishConfig.MaxFishQuality
member.summary: The max quality fish that can be caught. 0 = normal, 1 = silver, 2 = gold, 3 = iridium, 4+ = beyond iridium.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Config.FishConfig.MaxNormalFishQuality
member.summary: Determines the max quality fish a non-perfect catch can get, or null for no restrictions.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Config.FishConfig.FishChances
member.summary: The chance that you'll find a fish instead of trash.

member.name: M:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Config.FishConfig.GetQualityIncrease(System.Int32)
member.summary: Calculates the quality increase from a 's streak.
member.param: The streak.
member.returns: The number of quality levels to increase the result by.

member.name: M:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Config.FishConfig.ClampQuality(TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.CatchInfo.FishCatch)
member.summary: Clamps the quality of a fish to allowed bounds. Also increases quality level 3 to quality level 4 (before clamping it).
member.param: The catch info.

member.name: T:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Config.FishingChances
member.summary: Configuration for the chances of catching something while fishing.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Config.FishingChances.BaseChance
member.summary: The base chance. Total chance is calculated as locationFactor * (baseChance + sum(factor * thing it's a factor of)), bounded in the range [minChance, maxChance], then bounded once again in the range [0, 1].

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Config.FishingChances.StreakFactor
member.summary: The effect that streak has on this chance.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Config.FishingChances.FishingLevelFactor
member.summary: The effect that fishing level has on this chance.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Config.FishingChances.DailyLuckFactor
member.summary: The effect that daily luck has on this chance.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Config.FishingChances.LuckLevelFactor
member.summary: The effect that luck level has on this chance.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Config.FishingChances.MinChance
member.summary: The minimum possible chance.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Config.FishingChances.MaxChance
member.summary: The maximum possible chance.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Config.FishingChances.LocationFactors
member.summary: The effects that specific locations have on this chance. Keys are location names and values are their factors.

member.name: M:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Config.FishingChances.GetUnclampedChance(StardewValley.Farmer,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the unclamped chance for a .
member.param: The farmer to calculate the chance for.
The farmer's fishing streak.
member.returns: The calculated chance for that farmer.

member.name: M:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Config.FishingChances.ClampChance(System.Double)
member.summary: Clamps the chance to an allowed value.
member.param: The chance to clamp.

member.name: T:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Config.HudConfig
member.summary: Configuration for the fishing HUD.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Config.HudConfig.ShowFishingHud
member.summary: Whether or not to show current streak, chance for treasure, chance for each fish, etc. while fishing.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Config.HudConfig.TopLeftX
member.summary: The X coordinate of the top left corner of the fishing HUD.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Config.HudConfig.TopLeftY
member.summary: The Y coordinate of the top left corner of the fishing HUD.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Config.HudConfig.MaxFishTypes
member.summary: The number of fish to show on the fishing HUD.

member.name: T:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Config.JsonConfigRoot
member.summary: A configuration.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Config.JsonConfigRoot.Schema
member.summary: Optional '$schema' URL. This is ignored and exists entirely for convenience.

member.name: T:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Config.TreasureChances
member.summary: Configuration for the chances of catching treasure while fishing.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Config.TreasureChances.MagnetFactor
member.summary: The effect that the magnet bait has.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Config.TreasureChances.TreasureHunterFactor
member.summary: The effect that the treasure hunter tackle has.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Config.TreasureChances.PirateFactor
member.summary: The effect that the pirate profession has. This is multiplied by your base chance before being added.

member.name: T:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Config.TreasureConfig
member.summary: Configuration for treasure.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Config.TreasureConfig.MaxTreasureQuantity
member.summary: Maximum amount of treasure you can find in a single chest while fishing.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Config.TreasureConfig.AllowDuplicateLoot
member.summary: Whether the treasure randomizer should be allowed to select the same loot option multiple times. Some loot can't be repeated even if duplicate loot is enabled.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Config.TreasureConfig.InvertChancesOnPerfectCatch
member.summary: Whether to invert the chances of each treasure entry when you get a perfect catch and treasure chest at the same time. For example, when this is enabled, getting a perfect catch and treasure chest together would make an item that normally has a 1% chance of showing in a chest instead have a 99% chance of appearing.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Config.TreasureConfig.CatchSpeed
member.summary: Affects how fast you catch treasure.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Config.TreasureConfig.DrainSpeed
member.summary: Affects how fast the treasure bar drains when the bobber isn't on the chest.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Config.TreasureConfig.TreasureChances
member.summary: The chances of finding treasure while fishing.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Config.TreasureConfig.AdditionalLootChances
member.summary: The chances of getting additional loot when finding treasure. This is rolled until it fails or the max number of items have been added to the loot.

member.summary: Draws a string with a shadow behind it.

The font the text should use.
The string to draw.
The position of the string.
The color of the string. The shadow is black.
The color of the shadow.
The amount to scale the size of the string by.
The depth of the string.
The depth of the shadow.

member.name: E:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Gui.CustomBobberBar.CatchFish
member.summary: Invoked whenever a fish is caught.

member.summary: Invoked whenever a perfect streak is lost.

member.name: T:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Integrations.Emp.IEmpApi
member.summary: EMP's SMAPI API interface. Allows direct interaction with other SMAPI mods, e.g. access to EMP feature data.
member.remarks: Copy this interface into your mod and reference it to get EMP's API from SMAPI: Helper.ModRegistry.GetApi<IEmpApi>("Esca.EMP");

member.name: M:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Integrations.Emp.IEmpApi.GetFishLocationsData(StardewValley.GameLocation,Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Vector2,System.String@,System.Nullable{System.Int32}@,System.Nullable{System.Boolean}@)
member.summary: Gets overridden fish location settings for the provided location and tile, if any.
member.param: The in-game location to check.
The tile to check, e.g. the position of a fishing bobber or a player.
The name of the location to use instead of the provided location (e.g. the key to use in the Data/Locations asset). Null if the original location should be used.
The fishing zone to use. Null if the original zone should be used. "Zone" refers to the result of .
True if this tile should use ocean results for crab pots; false if it should use freshwater results. Null if the original results should be used.

member.name: T:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Integrations.GenericModConfigMenu.IGenericModConfigMenuApi
member.summary: The API which lets other mods add a config UI through Generic Mod Config Menu.

member.name: M:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Integrations.GenericModConfigMenu.IGenericModConfigMenuApi.Register(StardewModdingAPI.IManifest,System.Action,System.Action,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Register a mod whose config can be edited through the UI.
member.param: The mod's manifest.
Reset the mod's config to its default values.
Save the mod's current config to the config.json file.
Whether the options can only be edited from the title screen.
member.remarks: Each mod can only be registered once, unless it's deleted via before calling this again.

member.summary: Add a section title at the current position in the form.
member.param: The mod's manifest.
The title text shown in the form.
The tooltip text shown when the cursor hovers on the title, or null to disable the tooltip.

member.summary: Add a paragraph of text at the current position in the form.

The paragraph text to display.

member.summary: Add an image at the current position in the form.

The pixel area within the texture to display, or null to show the entire image.
The zoom factor to apply to the image.

member.summary: Add a boolean option at the current position in the form.

Get the current value from the mod config.
Set a new value in the mod config.
The label text to show in the form.
The tooltip text shown when the cursor hovers on the field, or null to disable the tooltip.
The unique field ID for use with , or null to auto-generate a randomized ID.

member.summary: Add an integer option at the current position in the form.

Set a new value in the mod config.
The label text to show in the form.

The minimum allowed value, or null to allow any.
The maximum allowed value, or null to allow any.
The interval of values that can be selected.
The unique field ID for use with , or null to auto-generate a randomized ID.

The label text to show in the form.

The values that can be selected, or null to allow any.

member.name: M:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Integrations.GenericModConfigMenu.IGenericModConfigMenuApi.AddPage(StardewModdingAPI.IManifest,System.String,System.Func{System.String})
member.summary: Start a new page in the mod's config UI, or switch to that page if it already exists. All options registered after this will be part of that page.
member.param: The mod's manifest.
The unique page ID.
The page title shown in its UI, or null to show the value.
member.remarks: You must also call to make the page accessible. This is only needed to set up a multi-page config UI. If you don't call this method, all options will be part of the mod's main config UI instead.

member.name: M:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Integrations.GenericModConfigMenu.IGenericModConfigMenuApi.AddPageLink(StardewModdingAPI.IManifest,System.String,System.Func{System.String},System.Func{System.String})
member.summary: Add a link to a page added via at the current position in the form.
member.param: The mod's manifest.
The unique ID of the page to open when the link is clicked.
The link text shown in the form.
The tooltip text shown when the cursor hovers on the link, or null to disable the tooltip.

member.summary: Add an option at the current position in the form using custom rendering logic.
member.param: The mod's manifest.
The label text to show in the form.
The tooltip text shown when the cursor hovers on the field, or null to disable the tooltip.
Draw the option in the config UI. This is called with the sprite batch being rendered and the pixel position at which to start drawing.
Save the current value to the mod config.
The pixel height to allocate for the option in the form, or null for a standard input-sized option. This is called and cached each time the form is opened.
The unique field ID for use with , or null to auto-generate a randomized ID.
member.remarks: The custom logic represented by and is responsible for managing its own state if needed. For example, you can store state in a static field or use closures to use a state variable.

member.name: M:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Integrations.GenericModConfigMenu.IGenericModConfigMenuApi.SetTitleScreenOnlyForNextOptions(StardewModdingAPI.IManifest,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Set whether the options registered after this point can only be edited from the title screen.
member.param: The mod's manifest.
Whether the options can only be edited from the title screen.
member.remarks: This lets you have different values per-field. Most mods should just set it once in .

member.name: M:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Integrations.GenericModConfigMenu.IGenericModConfigMenuApi.OnFieldChanged(StardewModdingAPI.IManifest,System.Action{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Register a method to notify when any option registered by this mod is edited through the config UI.
member.param: The mod's manifest.
The method to call with the option's unique field ID and new value.
member.remarks: Options use a randomized ID by default; you'll likely want to specify the fieldId argument when adding options if you use this.

member.name: M:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Integrations.GenericModConfigMenu.IGenericModConfigMenuApi.OpenModMenu(StardewModdingAPI.IManifest)
member.summary: Open the config UI for a specific mod.
member.param: The mod's manifest.

member.name: M:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Integrations.GenericModConfigMenu.IGenericModConfigMenuApi.TryGetCurrentMenu(StardewModdingAPI.IManifest@,System.String@)
member.summary: Get the currently-displayed mod config menu, if any.
member.param: The manifest of the mod whose config menu is being shown, or null if not applicable.
The page ID being shown for the current config menu, or null if not applicable. This may be null even if a mod config menu is shown (e.g. because the mod doesn't have pages).
member.returns: Returns whether a mod config menu is being shown.

member.name: M:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Integrations.GenericModConfigMenu.IGenericModConfigMenuApi.Unregister(StardewModdingAPI.IManifest)
member.summary: Remove a mod from the config UI and delete all its options and pages.
member.param: The mod's manifest.

member.name: M:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Services.ChanceCalculator`1.GetWeightedChance(TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.FishingInfo)
member.summary: Calculates the chance of catching this entry.
member.param: The fishing info to calculate the chance for.
member.returns: The chance of catching this entry, or if the entry is not available.
